LanguageData.MorrowRim_enableVFEInsectoids: Enable adding chitin to Vanilla Factions Expanded Insectoids.
LanguageData.MorrowRim_enableLoggingOnGameStart: Enable logging of patches on game start.
LanguageData.MorrowRim_chitinMultiplier: Percentage based multiplier for the amount of chitin given to insectoids.
LanguageData.MorrowRim_useVFEInsectoidsChitin: Switch to giving insects VFE Insectoids chitin.
LanguageData.MorrowRim_useAlphaAnimalsChitin: Switch to giving insects alpha animals chitin.
LanguageData.MorrowRim_enableVFEInsectoidsChitinRecip: Enable recipes for converting between chitin and VFE Insectoids chitin.
LanguageData.MorrowRim_enableAlphaAnimalsChitinRecipe: Enable recipes for converting between chitin and Alpha Animals chitin.
LanguageData.MorrowRim_restartWarning: Settings will have no effect until the game is restarted.
